Text:
Red Dragon (Hong Xiguan zhi Shaolin wu zu or The Legend of the Red Dragon) came out in 1994. Produced by Jing Wong.
pretty modern, still has an old feel to it.
for those of you who don't know what it's about, it's kunf fu (shaolin) movie about a young man and his 'son' that wander china.
Please lett us know, when the damn movie is DUBBED !! damnit, when chinese ppl, suddenly speaks English.. It's just... it's just FRUSTRATING DAMNIT !!
LMFAO, relax, dude. Just read the description, it clearly says 'spoken language: english'
